item.title: PgBouncer
item.description: New to KubeDB? Please start here. This is an Enterprise-only feature. Please install KubeDB Enterprise Edition to try this feature. Overview PgBouncer is an open-source, lightweight, single-binary connection-pooling middleware for PostgreSQL. PgBouncer maintains a pool of connections for each locally stored user-database pair. It is typically configured to hand out one of these connections to a new incoming client connection, and return it back in to the pool when the client disconnects.
